get in

we are going to brazil
和朋友一起玩超级有趣！
um tipo de historia muito competente
Bastante interessante, puzzles bem difíceis e geniais.
双人脑瘫合作，我是傻逼！
Great story, unique gameplay, also good steam workshop maps :)

在通過某個一個測試關卡時 你會自己根本就是個天才 
但事實只是蝦碰剛好飛到門口而已 但這遊戲就是有這個魔力 讓你覺得自己很厲害 
總之難度控管相當的好 
還有我相信這遊戲再過10年 依舊會被認為很有創意
這就V社這麼厲害的原因 做好遊戲再死不出3
güzel fakat tam hikaye istiyorsanız portal 1'ide bitirin
It's just really good. Great story line, cool graphics, and lots of nostalgia for me at least.
经典中的经典，v社发烧作

Рекомендую!!!
Крутой сюжет, Крутой графон тянет даже на слабых пк!
maybe the best puzzle game ever
Одна из лучших головоломок, проверенная временем.
Great game, so addictive, the story is very immersive, and all the plot twist, wow
GERÇEKTEN ÇOK GÜZEL Bİ OYUN HİKAYE TARZI OYUNLAR SEVİYOSANIZ SİZE GÖRE
I'm too fucking dumb for this game. Couldn't finish the first level lol

Había comprado este juego con el único propósito de jugarlo en modo cooperativo durante la pandemia, y hace unos minutos me acabo de terminar el modo historia y me pareció excelente, muy entretenido, buenísimos puzzles, buena sensación de vértigo y buena historia, totalmente recomendable, totalmente aprobado.
me and a friend spent an hour on one puzzle in coop and we both totally defientellyh got a perfec scroe on hsuro rpseitcves SaTS so were smart and game hrad 11.029939489392901/9.399189003
Вы читаете комментарий чтобы понять, хороша ли эта игра или нет. Определённо хороша
싱글모드 협동모드 맵제작까지 싹다 퀄개굿 갓겜
I love the puzzles and the narrative.
One of the best games i have ever played. both single player and multiplayer mode is so well done. definitly worth the money!
Jogo ótimo! Historia bem produzida, gráficos lindos, simplismente incrivel!
The best riddle-game of all time. Only thing I dont like is that there is no third part of Portal.

Сюжет - класс
Господин Графоний - на месте
Кооп - достойный
Головоломки - есть
Музыка,озвучка - круто
Юмор - присутствует
Arguably one of the best games of all time. If you haven't played this and Portal 1 yet, what the hell are you doing?

1. Place blue portal
2. Place Orange portal
3. Travel through the portals
4. That's basically the whole game + puzzles to solve using your portals and a good story
اللعبه ممتعه سولو او مع الناس و جدا تشغل المخ
Fun fun Fun Fun Fun FUN FUN FUN FUN!!!
Great game! The puzzles are very fun to solve and the storyline is amazing.
really good i'll come back again and again and again so good gameplay and good sorry and good puzzle's so do i like it yes i love it
So I just finished the game today and let me tell you, this game will make you feel emotions you've never felt.
Really fun and levels become more varied as you play
HIS GAME IN ONE WORD IS EPIC
Even after almost a decade, I can say that this game is still ahead of its time!

Portal 2 é um jogo demasiadamente bom já que roda em aparelhos de baixo custo, alem de apresentar uma jogabilidade interessante e ao mesmo tempo fluida que pode ser aproveitado tanto sozinho quanto em COOP. De forma que permite uma ótima experiência no geral devido a gameplay fluida e inovadora por parte do game.

Single player was amazing, while Co-op ruined my friendships.

10/10 would ruin friendships again

难度较1代没多大提升，画质些许提高，剧情终于有中文字幕了，结尾还好，中规中矩的益智类游戏！
游戏进去明显感觉鼠标延迟，改了好多都无用，最后找到视频选项，把垂直关掉，完美解决！
Its fun and enjoyable EDIT: help
Советую Игру!! Сюжет продуманный и очень реалестичный! Игра разварачивается во вселенной Half Live 2! Вопщем игра супер всем советую!!
Exelente segunda entrega, supero mis expectativas, buena historia, desarollo de personajes y buenas mecanicas. Me queda por probar el coop, pero si duda es un juego que considero de culto ya.

옛날 겜이라고는 믿을 수 없는 그래픽
퍼즐이 ㄴㅇㄱ

친구랑 하는데 한명이 주도적으로 풀다가 과부화오면 다른사람이 주도하게됨
야 이제 너가 좀 해봐라고 말도 안했는데 자연스레 바톤터치
